verses.verse: אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> After הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these כְּשֹׁ֕ךְ <S%H7918><s%> was appeased חֲמַ֖ת <S%H2534><s%> when the wrath הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֑וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus זָכַ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> he remembered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> וַשְׁתִּי֙ <S%H2060><s%> Vashti וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and what עָשָׂ֔תָה <S%H6213><s%> and what she had done וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and what נִגְזַ֖ר <S%H1504><s%> and what was decreed עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said נַעֲרֵֽי־ <S%H5288><s%> servants הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's מְשָׁרְתָ֑יו <S%H8334><s%> that ministered יְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> sought לַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king נְעָר֥וֹת <S%H5291><s%> young בְּתוּל֖וֹת <S%H1330><s%> virgins טוֹב֥וֹת <S%H2896><s%> beautiful מַרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> apparently

וְיַפְקֵ֨ד <S%H6485><s%> appoint הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And let the king פְּקִידִים֮ <S%H6496><s%> officers בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְדִינ֣וֹת <S%H4082><s%> in all the provinces מַלְכוּתוֹ֒ <S%H4438><s%> of his kingdom וְיִקְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> that they may gather together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נַעֲרָֽה־ <S%H5291><s%> young בְ֠תוּלָה <S%H1330><s%> virgins טוֹבַ֨ת <S%H2896><s%> beautiful מַרְאֶ֜ה <S%H4758><s%> apparently אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of שׁוּשַׁ֤ן <S%H7800><s%> unto Shushan הַבִּירָה֙ <S%H1002><s%> the palace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> of the women אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> unto the custody הֵגֶ֛א <S%H1896><s%> of Hege סְרִ֥יס <S%H5631><s%> chamberlain הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> keeper הַנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> of the women וְנָת֖וֹן <S%H5414><s%> be given תַּמְרוּקֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H8562><s%> and let their things for purification

וְהַֽנַּעֲרָ֗ה <S%H5291><s%> And let the maiden אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who תִּיטַב֙ <S%H3190><s%> be accepted בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> affliction הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king תִּמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> be queen תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> place וַשְׁתִּ֑י <S%H2060><s%> instead of Vashti וַיִּיטַ֧ב <S%H3190><s%> be accepted הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> And the thing בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> affliction הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he did so כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> accordingly ס

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> there was a certain יְהוּדִ֔י <S%H3064><s%> Jew הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְּשׁוּשַׁ֣ן <S%H7800><s%> [Now] in Shushan הַבִּירָ֑ה <S%H1002><s%> the palace וּשְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name מָרְדֳּכַ֗י <S%H4782><s%> [was] Mordecai בֶּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> the son יָאִ֧יר <S%H2971><s%> of Jair בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שִׁמְעִ֛י <S%H8096><s%> of Shimei בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> of Kish אִ֥ישׁ יְמִינִֽי׃ <S%H1145><s%> a Benjamite

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who הָגְלָה֙ <S%H1540><s%> Who had been carried away מִיר֣וּשָׁלַ֔יִם <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַגֹּלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> with the captivity אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הָגְלְתָ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> which had been carried away עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with יְכָנְיָ֣ה <S%H3204><s%> with Jeconiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> had carried away נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> whom Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become אֹמֵ֜ן <S%H539><s%> And he brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֲדַסָּ֗ה <S%H1919><s%> Hadassah הִ֤יא <S%H1931><s%> that אֶסְתֵּר֙ <S%H635><s%> that [is] Esther בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter דֹּד֔וֹ <S%H1730><s%> his uncle's כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> had לָ֖הּ אָ֣ב <S%H1><s%> for she had neither father וָאֵ֑ם <S%H517><s%> nor mother וְהַנַּעֲרָ֤ה <S%H5291><s%> and the maid יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> was beautiful תֹּ֙אַר֙ <S%H8389><s%> of form וְטוֹבַ֣ת <S%H2896><s%> good מַרְאֶ֔ה <S%H4758><s%> and face וּבְמ֤וֹת <S%H4194><s%> were dead אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> when her father וְאִמָּ֔הּ <S%H517><s%> and mother לְקָחָ֧הּ <S%H3947><s%> took מָרְדֳּכַ֛י <S%H4782><s%> whom Mordecai ל֖וֹ לְבַֽת׃ <S%H1323><s%> for his own daughter

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּהִשָּׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> was heard דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> commandment הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> So it came to pass when the king's וְדָת֔וֹ <S%H1881><s%> and his decree וּֽבְהִקָּבֵ֞ץ <S%H6908><s%> were gathered together נְעָר֥וֹת <S%H5291><s%> maidens רַבּ֛וֹת <S%H7227><s%> and when many אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> of שׁוּשַׁ֥ן <S%H7800><s%> unto Shushan הַבִּירָ֖ה <S%H1002><s%> the palace אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> to the custody הֵגָ֑י <S%H1896><s%> of Hegai וַתִּלָּקַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> was brought אֶסְתֵּר֙ <S%H635><s%> that Esther אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> also unto the king's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> to the custody הֵגַ֖י <S%H1896><s%> of Hegai שֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> keeper הַנָּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> of the women

וַתִּיטַ֨ב <S%H3190><s%> be accepted הַנַּעֲרָ֣ה <S%H5291><s%> And the maiden בְעֵינָיו֮ <S%H5869><s%> affliction וַתִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> him and she obtained חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness לְפָנָיו֒ <S%H6440><s%> of him וַ֠יְבַהֵל <S%H926><s%> and he speedily אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּמְרוּקֶ֤יהָ <S%H8562><s%> her her things for purification וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָנוֹתֶ֙הָ֙ <S%H4490><s%> with such things as belonged לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> gave לָ֔הּ וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> to her and seven הַנְּעָר֔וֹת <S%H5291><s%> maidens הָרְאֻי֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> [which were] meet לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> to be given לָ֖הּ מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> her out of the king's וַיְשַׁנֶּ֧הָ <S%H8138><s%> and he preferred וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲרוֹתֶ֛יהָ <S%H5291><s%> her and her maids לְט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> unto the best בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [place] of the house הַנָּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> of the women

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> had not shewed אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> Esther אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמָּ֖הּ <S%H5971><s%> her people וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֽוֹלַדְתָּ֑הּ <S%H4138><s%> nor her kindred כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for מָרְדֳּכַ֛י <S%H4782><s%> for Mordecai צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had charged עָלֶ֖יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַגִּֽיד׃ <S%H5046><s%> her that she should not shew

וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> every day וָי֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day מָרְדֳּכַי֙ <S%H4782><s%> And Mordecai מִתְהַלֵּ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before חֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> the court בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> house הַנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> of the women's לָדַ֙עַת֙ <S%H3045><s%> to know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> did אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <S%H635><s%> how Esther וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> was and how יֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and what should become בָּֽהּ׃

וּבְהַגִּ֡יעַ <S%H5060><s%> was come תֹּר֩ <S%H8447><s%> turn נַעֲרָ֨ה <S%H5291><s%> Now when every maid's וְנַעֲרָ֜ה <S%H5291><s%> young לָב֣וֹא ׀ <S%H935><s%> to go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֗וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus מִקֵּץ֩ <S%H7093><s%> after הֱי֨וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לָ֜הּ כְּדָ֤ת <S%H1881><s%> according to the manner הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> of the women שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten חֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> months כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> as כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> follows יִמְלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> accomplished יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> (for so were the days מְרוּקֵיהֶ֑ן <S%H4795><s%> of their purifications שִׁשָּׁ֤ה <S%H8337><s%> [to wit] six חֳדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2320><s%> months בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with oil הַמֹּ֔ר <S%H4753><s%> of myrrh וְשִׁשָּׁ֤ה <S%H8337><s%> and six חֳדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2320><s%> months בַּבְּשָׂמִ֔ים <S%H1314><s%> with sweet odours וּבְתַמְרוּקֵ֖י <S%H8562><s%> and with [other] things for the purifying הַנָּשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> women

וּבָזֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H5291><s%> [every] maiden בָּאָ֣ה <S%H935><s%> Then thus came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> that תֹּאמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> whatsoever she desired יִנָּ֤תֵֽן <S%H5414><s%> was given לָהּ֙ לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> her to go עִמָּ֔הּ <S%H5973><s%> with מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> with her out of the house הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> of the women עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king's
